data.name: Dialogue Twixt Ancient Tree and Rock
data.route: Dialogue Twixt Ancient Tree and Rock
data.description: This green-leaved tree and mountain rock aren't anything special.\nA certain alley poet once claimed that everything in this world has an aura and that this tree and the rock were having a wordless conversation. Many others, influenced by her words, came to believe more and more that these words were quite fitting indeed.

text.text: Whenever I go for a stroll around Mondstadt and see the citizens happy and free, I feel deeply inspired.
The Knights perform our duty precisely so that the city's residents may live in peace.
The atmosphere in this park is excellent. Thank you...
